name: Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II

achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Land of Surging Thunder (II)
achievements.desc: Light up the Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island areas of the Inazuma map.

achievements.name: Thunderbolting Across the Land (II)
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island areas of Inazuma.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Inazuma Tenryou (II)
achievements.desc: Unlock all Shrines of Depths in the Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island areas of Inazuma.

achievements.name: Naku Weed Whacker (II)
achievements.desc: Follow 4 Electro Seelie on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Naku Weed Whacker (II)
achievements.desc: Follow 8 Electro Seelie on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Naku Weed Whacker (II)
achievements.desc: Follow 16 Electro Seelie on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lights Will Guide You Home (II)
achievements.desc: Follow 6 Seelie to their Seelie Courts on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (II)
achievements.desc: Open 40 chests on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (II)
achievements.desc: Open 80 chests on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (II)
achievements.desc: Open 160 chests on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (II)
achievements.desc: Complete 6 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (II)
achievements.desc: Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

achievements.name: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (II)
achievements.desc: Complete 24 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.
